name: GrokMultiverse Testnet Genesis
description:
This is the official Genesis Testing NFT for the GrokMultiverse ecosystem, deployed exclusively on the Solana Devnet. This asset is strictly for protocol validation and system stress-testing purposes.

Technical Constraints:
- Limited Issuance: One-time mint for authorized testers.
- Non-Transferable: Bound to the original minter's wallet.
- Zero Commercial Value: Devnet-only asset, 'Proof of Testing' certificate.
